items.title: Three-front war and the new moat
items.text: AI raised expectations, collapsed channels, and intensified competition, so growth depended on trust.

items.title: Trust-based acquisition replaces broken channels
items.text: SEO, SEM, and corporate social weakened, while people, creators, community, and product built trust.

items.title: Trust-based retention becomes the growth system
items.text: As AI commoditized utility, retention came from roadmap transparency, fast iteration, WOW UX, and aligned pricing.
